From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron finally composed himself, and took off his cannon and stored it
on his back. He then chuckled deeply, laughing at this pathetic
cardboard cut out. He had seen many like him, getting full of themselves
because they had the Matrix. He was Megatron, he needed no Matrix.
"Then" he began, as his hand extended into his arm, and a pink ball and
chain, a weapon of energy extended itself, "you DIE for daring Maximal
child" he cursed. He began to swing his mace, creating a whirl of energy
beside him, and smiled. It was her move.
